title.rendered: Art Hearts Fashion Unveils a Four-Day Fashion Fairytale at Art Basel 2023

content.rendered:
MIAMI  Art Hearts Fashion is excited to host four-days of iconic fashion shows, art exhibitions and parties during Art Basel 2023 from Dec. 7 - 10, 2023 to celebrate creativity, fashion and creativity during the worlds biggest global art festival. 

Embark on a Whimsical Journey with Art Hearts Fashion at Art Basel 2023!

Amidst the enchanting tapestry of Art Basel, where dreams and creativity intertwine, Art Hearts Fashion invites you to a four-day extravaganza celebrating the magic of fashion, art, and unbridled imagination. Join us from December 7 - 10th, 2023 as we unveil an artistic spectacle that transcends the ordinary and dances in the realms of fantasy.

Sizzle Highlight Reel of Miami Swim Week, NYFW and LA Fashion Week Runway Shows & Events by Art Hearts Fashion

Miami Art Week 2023 Sizzle Reel

THURSDAY, DECEMBER 7, 2023

The Fabel Miami Rooftop: A Tale of Stars and Threads 9 PM

The grand saga begins on December 7th, 2023 at Fabel Miami Rooftop (50 NW 23 Str., Miami, FL). Picture a VIP dinner party and fashion show under the stars as Giannina Azar, Julie and Brazilian echo-friendly beachwear brand, Lybethras will unveil new fashion collections. Celebrity fashion designer Azar has most famously had her stunning couture ensembles worn by Beyonc on her Renaissance album as well as dressed the likes of Jennifer Lopez, Gwen Stefani, and dozens more. A live performance will also take place during this fabulous Art Basel event by singer and songwriter Sarah Micheaa. Join us in this culinary oasis at 9 pm on 12/07/23 to celebrate fashion and dreams as Art Hearts Fashion weaves fashion, music, and artistry together under the moonlight and stars.

VIP Tickets are available for sale online here

Media & influencer complimentary admission tickets available

For VIP media or celebrity RSVP inquiries, please write to timur@designingthedistrict.com & samantha@savory-pr.com. 

FRIDAY, DECEMBER 8, 2023

Kiki on The River: A Riverside Odyssey of Boho-Chic Marvels

Lila Nikole Swimwear Runway Show 

Black Tape Project models

Mister Triple X

Mister Triple X mens and womens runway looks on the runway with founder & CEO, Erik Rosete 

On Friday, December 8th, 2023, the journey will continue at Kiki on The River (450 NW North River Drive, Miami, FL, 33128). As the moonlight reflects on the river, witness risqu & fresh runway shows from Lila Nikole, Mister Triple X, Black Tape Project by Drakhan Blackhart. . 

Immerse yourself in the boho-chic atmosphere, where Greek food and fashion will enchant you from 9 pm to 2 am. 

Tickets available for sale online here

Media & influencer complimentary admission tickets available

Morfium Fashion

Richerette by Richie Rich 

Love For Upcycling 

SUNDAY, December 10th, 2023 

The Vessel: A Seafaring Finale of Sun-Kissed Bliss 2 - 7 PM (invite only)

As the enchanting week of Art Basel draws to a close, Art Hearts Fashion invites you to the grand finale aboard The Vessel, Miami's only floating experiential venue. On Sunday, December 10, 2023, join us mid-day for a swimwear and resort wear party & live art activation by Scott Marsi along with fashion runway looks from our top designer summer collections. This daytime event will feature other captivating artwork curated by Six Summit Gallery and run from 2 PM to 7 PM. Guests can enjoy a live DJ set and a bar experience perfect for winding down and closing out Art Basel 2023 in perfect Miami style amidst the sun, sea, and magical allure of The Vessel. Limited tickets are available and the event guest list is by RSVP only. Don't miss the chance to be part of this fairytale finale, where imagination meets the horizon for an unforgettable closing chapter on the seas. Enjoy an Art Basel finale like never before, where the sun, the sea, and the magic of Art Basel converge for one last spellbinding soire. Email Timur@designingthedistrict.com for RSVP requests.

A Canvas of Sponsors and Elixirs

Our magical journey is made possible by sponsors like Beachwaver Co. and the timeless beauty of vegan/cruelty-free Billion Dollar Beauty. Quench your thirst with the elixirs of Smart Water & Aguas Frescas by Minute Maid, provided exclusively to VIP attendees.

For Your Royal Presence: For comp VIP tickets for top influencers, celebrities, or media, 20 golden passes await. Contact us to claim your royal ticket to this magical affair.

RSVP to the Kingdom of Art: For press, photography, media, and/or celebrity guest list RSVP bookings, send your scrolls to Timur@Designingthedistrict.com and Samantha@Savory-PR.com.

About Art Hearts Fashion:

Art Hearts Fashion, the custodian of this magical spectacle, is a globally recognized fashion show production organization. Since 2010, it has been propelling fashion forward, bringing together the most innovative designers worldwide. Learn more at https://artheartsfashion.com.

Join us in this Fairytale Adventure and Let Your Imagination Soar!
